knimeNode.name: Punctuation Erasure
knimeNode.shortDescription: Erases the punctuation symbols of terms.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to filter punctuation symbols out of terms of the given bag of words. The preprocessed terms are stored in the outgoing DataTable, as well as the documents containing these terms.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the column containing the documents to preprocess.
If deep preprocessing is checked, the terms contained inside the documents are converted too, this means that the documents are changed, which is more time consuming.

If append original document is checked, the documents contained in the input document column are appended as extra column. This enables later on a mapping of preprocessed documents to original documents.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the terms and the documents as a bag of words.

outPort.name: Preprocessed terms and related documents output table

ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed terms and the documents as a bag of words.
